Line.MultilineString: "So you want to learn how to be an adventurer? First thing you need to know is how to match orbs."
"Matching rows of 3 or more orbs of the same colour is the core of all adventuring skills."
"Just drag an orb in a direction to swap it with its neighbour. If the new orb position makes a line of 3 or more orbs of a colour it will swap. If it doesn't it will stay where it is."
"Well done! You seem to have the hang of it now."
"Beware, often you will be restricted to a certain number of swaps before you fail. Make your moves count!"
